components.calculateValue:
value = {
  cityStateZip: data.city + "," + data.state  + "," + data.zip,
  fullTimeEmployee:
    data.fTEmployeesFurnishedAnAuto +
    data.fTEmployeesWhoAreNotFurnished +
    data.fTAllOtherEmployees,
  partTimeEmployee:
    data.pTEmployeesFurnishedAnAuto +
    data.pTEmployeesWhoAreNotFurnished +
    data.pTAllOtherEmployees,
  fullName: data.genfirstname + data.genlastname
};

components.label: RPS Cyber PDF Data
components.calculateValue:
value = {
  "of Employees":
    data.employeedataGrid[0].fTEmployeesFurnishedAnAuto +
    data.employeedataGrid[0].fTEmployeesWhoAreNotFurnished +
    data.employeedataGrid[0].fTAllOtherEmployees +
    data.employeedataGrid[0].pTEmployeesFurnishedAnAuto +
    data.employeedataGrid[0].pTEmployeesWhoAreNotFurnished +
    data.employeedataGrid[0].pTAllOtherEmployees,
  "Firewalls?":
    data.antivirussoftware == "yes" && data.protectedfirewalls == "yes"
      ? "Yes"
      : "No",
  "Year Established": moment().format("YYYY") - data.numYearsOfOwnership
};
console.log(data.rpsCyberPDFData);
